chunk: Directions: Gently apply a proper amount of the cream on face, avoiding the eye and mouth area, after cleansing and toning. Tap the area where the cream was applied gently in order for it to be absorbed along the skin texture
book: 2178-COSRX Advanced Snail 92 All in One Cream

chunk: Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
